body: I really wouldn't call this NTR. It's more like an open relationship or hotwifing, so it's good in my book.
Boring and poorly laid out. 1 out of 5

Oh thank god for that cover. People need to do that more cause there are very certain circumstances that I like NTR, but every NTR doujin is a gamble. This immediately let me know that I'm not gonna like it. Thank god.
